class.name: ParallaxLayer
class.brief_description: A parallax scrolling layer to be used with [ParallaxBackground].
class.description: A ParallaxLayer must be the child of a [ParallaxBackground] node. All child nodes will be affected by the parallax scrolling of this layer.

method.name: get_mirroring
method.description: Return the mirroring of the ParallaxLayer.

method.name: get_motion_scale
method.description: Return the motion scale of the ParallaxLayer.

method.name: set_mirroring
method.description: Set the mirroring of the ParallaxLayer. If an axis is set to 0 then that axis will have no mirroring.

method.name: set_motion_scale
method.description: Set the motion scale of the ParallaxLayer. If an axis is set to 0 then it will not move at all, it will stick with the camera.
